about_the_game:
Background:



Miss Wei at Yuga Hospital (you can choose your name) has been having a lot of trouble lately.
Accidentally trapped with a mature Mr. Doctor, and all he wants to do is confess to you?
Beautiful high school patient has a hard time withstanding you. What happens if you leave him too long...
Just after a failed first aid, the scalpel that became the murder weapon appears in your hand...

Introduction：

linjing· Introduction of a new patient (cv: Squeaks)
It had rained heavily the night before, and there was a damp feeling in the air,
The window is still foggy, the sound of dripping rain has not stopped, there are some small flying insects in the corner quietly died...
Is this the first time I've started work at five o 'clock, and will it always be like this?
"Patient in room 218 needs a blood draw this morning."
Room 218. Who's in room 218......
Is that the boy from yesterday? My thoughts seem to return to yesterday, wearing school uniforms should be high school students, but a person alone to the hospital... .
Why would he say something like that to me... ...

What will you do in the face of a restless "him"?
· Be around and listen patiently
· Be responsible for others and leave early
[/img] [b]die· Encounter characters [/b] Every time I pass the street shop, the TV is still playing the same content, repeated, repeated... But I do not know why, every time I pass, I will still be deeply attracted to the ups and downs of the heart and the words that cannot be revealed, what kind of existence it is. Every morning, as usual, I arrived at the hospital early. "Good morning ~" "Eh?" "Are you distracted? Why are you so dull? Did you not have a good rest yesterday?" "I guess so. 苵 is the same as

yu· Ke Introduction | Doctor (cv:sora)
What a beautiful day. The clear day awakened by thunder, the blue sky washed by rain.
Thousands of miles, as clear and clear,
The only exception, the winding road, the thick mud can be seen,
I'm going to work in the outpatient department today. Can I adapt to the new environment? I feel so nervous......
"Knock knock -"
Just knocked on the door twice, and the door opened because of this weak force.
Is anyone in there...
Looked up and found only a young boy, leaning against the window looking at the information, this person is also an intern here?

In the face of the strange "teenager" in front of you, what will you do?
· Go up and say hello. Get to know your colleagues first
· Look in the next room. It's important to report to the director first



die· Encounter characters
Every time I pass the street shop, the TV is still playing the same content, repeated, repeated...
But I do not know why, every time I pass, I will still be deeply attracted to the ups and downs of the heart and the words that cannot be revealed, what kind of existence it is.
Every morning, as usual, I arrived at the hospital early.
"Good morning ~"
"Eh?"
"Are you distracted? Why are you so dull? Did you not have a good rest yesterday?"
"I guess so. 苵 is the same as usual, on time every day."
"Only today was on time."
While saying XiaoYing took off my coat, is as careful as ever, I skillfully walked to their own position.
"So are you ready, where do you want to start today?"

Game Features:

1. Two navigable men, but your encounter with them, has just begun......
2. Exquisite CG waiting for your unlock, at this stage has completed more than 30 CG, more are still being added, waiting for you to meet them.
3. Different decisions you make may lead to different fates for them, with more than 10 endings waiting for you to explore.
4. Two men accompanied by the whole voice, may bring you a different experience.

Production Staff:

zisangmuyi,ooip, yagu, wugawuyan

Japanese cv:

Lingjin: zhizhi Yu: sora

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains descriptions of stream of consciousness, self-harm, violence, and human-oriented interactive content, which may cause an uncomfortable experience, so please play as appropriate

name: 唯

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600ki
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTx 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: It's a story about you and them, centered around your time as a student nurse. The footsteps echoing in the empty corridors make you feel uneasy; In the ward, even the sounds of breathing were woven into a mysterious rhythm. Everything here seems to be telling its own secrets...
